description: This is a Software Solutions Start-up that provides software applications in Android, Web and Cloud to clients.
tasks: Tasked to head the Company’s first embedded systems project, enterprise-grade software as a first for the company and internal tools with complete success and within set deadlines.
Coding, debugging and testing applications life cycle to create and implement applications according to the Organization and Customers’ needs.
Conducting design, risk and reliability analysis by taking preliminary information from clients and provided models for the actual application.
Collaborating with the whole team to evaluate the product background holistically through communicating with the team to make sure they have the full context of the development work.
Managing software documentation and testing processes.
Charting out design specifications as instructed by clients and analysts.
